title: Velo Podcast: This Is How We’d Design Our Anything-Goes Dream Bikes
content:
How do you solve spectators entering Liège-Bastogne-Liège Femmes, thoughts on the Coros Dura computer, and an out there Kona gravel bike.

Read the full article at Velo Podcast: This Is How We’d Design Our Anything-Goes Dream Bikes on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
